attributes.action: Make all closed down public houses into Homeless Shelters..
attributes.additional_details: The old public houses are becoming a thing of the past and the breweries are closing them down, the buildings are being boarded up and left to fall apart and become eye sores on our towns.. Turn these buildings into shelters a place for the homeless to get a hot meal a drink, a shower, maybe some clean clothes or use the toilet. Nobody is going to buy these building so use them for something that is strongly needed.
attributes.background: There is far too many young male and female, ex service men and elderly people sleeping rough on our streets, they have fallen on hard times and have nothing or no one to help support them. It is time our country took stock and started looking after our own people.

rejection.details:
The UK Parliament and Government aren't responsible for closed public houses. 

You might like to sign and share this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/231149
